name: UFO Janitorial Services
description:
How to play:

Press any button or left mouse button to take control of a UFO.

Press again to Pulse. Hold to stop moving.

Press another button on the first planet for multiplayer.

Clean all the space debris to move to the next planet.

_______________________________________________________________________

Originally made in 2 weeks for the Opera GX Game

https://gamejolt.com/c/gamemaker/ogxgj

Music had to be cut due to size constraints

_______________________________________________________________________

Sound Effects:

  • Eric Matyas - https://www.soundimage.org/
